name: Pilgrimage of Zed
description:
A short game made for the GMTK Jam 2020, on the theme Out of Control.

Help the Zed find a new home by guiding their path into the unknown.

Played with Mouse and Keyboard.

This is my first prototype game made without the help of some course or lesson plan, done mostly as a self-imposed challenge to see how far I've come in 2 months of learning Unity and C#.
